name: bernieworld
description: I love [Super Bernie World](https://eniko.itch.io/superbernieworld), but they use a proprietary game-engine that they cant't release as open-source. For fun, I ported it to [pixi.js](https://www.pixijs.com/) using their content. All game-content credit goes to [eniko](https://eniko.itch.io/). This makes it so you can edit levels and make new ones!
